Motivision - Transform Your New Tab Experience

Motivision is a minimalist new tab extension designed to bring motivation and simplicity to your browser. Every time you open a new tab, youâ€™ll be greeted with inspiring quotes and stunning background images from Unsplash, helping you stay focused and positive throughout your day.
What It Does:

    Inspiring Quotes: Motivision fetches motivational quotes from ZenQuotes to fuel your day with positivity and encouragement.
    Beautiful Backgrounds: Every new tab features a breathtaking image from Unsplash, adding a touch of beauty and serenity to your browsing experience.
    Minimalist Design: With its sleek and simple interface, Motivision removes distractions and gives you exactly what you need to stay focused.

Why Install It?

    Boost Your Productivity: Start every session with a fresh dose of inspiration to keep you motivated.
    Aesthetic Design: Enjoy gorgeous background images every time you open a new tab.
    No Distractions: The simple and clean interface ensures that you stay focused on what matters most.

Get Started Now:

Transform your browsing experience with Motivision. Install it today and bring a little extra motivation to your daily routine.
